item.title: Ames Housing Prices Project
item.description: Intro & Background I’ve just joined the House Prices: Advanced Regression Techniques Competition, whch is a Getting Started competition. Kaggle describes this competition as follows: Ask a home buyer to describe their dream house, and they probably won’t begin with the height of the basement ceiling or the proximity to an east-west railroad. But this playground competition’s dataset proves that much more influences price negotiations than the number of bedrooms or a white-picket fence.
